== Introduction ==
VariCAD is a CAD program that opens a variety of CAD/ CAM file formats including Autocad DWG files. VariVAD viewer is re distributable proprietary <nowiki>[[freeware]]</nowiki> and VariCAD is <nowiki>[[proprietary]]</nowiki>.

=== Install viewer ===
Tested on Ubuntu 8.04 (Hardy Heron) and Ubuntu 7.10 (Gutsy Gibbon).

* Download the GCC 4.1 debian package on <nowiki>[[https://www.varicad.com/3dcaddownload.phtml|the varicad download page]]</nowiki>
* Click OK to open the .deb file with gdebi-gtk (normally default in firefox)
* Click "Install Package"
